oai_dc:dc.dc:title: New synthetic approach to a [1.1.6] metapara cyclophane derivative via Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling and ring-closing metathesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
MANDAL, K
ARORA, KK
PEDIREDDI, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: organic-synthesis
dimerization
cyclophanes
olefin metathesis
palladium
ruthenium
suzuki-miyaura cross-coupling
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The synthesis of a [1.1.6] metapara cyclophane derivative, 1,5(1,4),3(1,3)-tribenzenacycloun-decaphan-8-ene-6,11-dione, has been achieved via the Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling of alpha,alpha'-dibromo-m-xylene with an arylboronic acid derivative followed by an allylation and ring-closing metathesis reaction sequence.
